caption.label: Table caption
caption.desc: Caption text for an HTML table

float.label: Float
float.desc: How to wrap text around an element

extractorMetadataFilterBy.label: Filter Metadata By
extractorMetadataFilterBy.desc: A property in the metadata used to filter metadata results for display

extractorResourcesFilterBy.label: Filter Resources By
extractorResourcesFilterBy.desc: A property in the metadata used to filter search results

extractorMetadataSortBy.label: Sort By Metadata
extractorMetadataSortBy.desc: How to sort metadata fields for display

extractorResourcesSortBy.label: Sort resources by
extractorResourcesSortBy.desc: The property to use for sorting results

extractorMetadataSortOrder.label: Metadata sort order
extractorMetadataSortOrder.desc: The order to sort metadata by, e.g. asc or desc

extractorResourcesSortOrder.label: Resources Sort Order
extractorResourcesSortOrder.desc: The order to sort results by, e.g. asc or desc

extractorMetadataSortByProperty.label: Sort Metadata By Property
extractorMetadataSortByProperty.desc: The metadata property to use for...

extractorResourcesSortByProperty.label: Sort Resources By Property
extractorResourcesSortByProperty.desc: Property to use when sorting results

extractorMetadataToShow.label: Metadata To Show
extractorMetadataToShow.desc: The specific metadata properties to display

fetcherMetadataToShow.label: Metadata To Show
fetcherMetadataToShow.desc: The specific metadata properties to display

fetcherGroupBy.label: Group by
fetcherGroupBy.desc: Property to use for grouping results

fetcherFilterBy.label: Filter by
fetcherFilterBy.desc: Property to use for filtering results

fetcherSortBy.label: Sort by
fetcherSortBy.desc: Property to use for sorting results

fetcherSortOrder.label: Sort order
fetcherSortOrder.desc: The order with which to sort results

fetcherSortByProperty.label: Sort by property
fetcherSortByProperty.desc: The property to use for sorting results

resourceLinkProp.label: Resource Link Property
resourceLinkProp.desc: The property to use as the link back to the original resource

mediaLinkProp.label: Media Link Property
mediaLinkProp.desc: The property to use as the link back to the original media

mediaUriProp.label: Media URI Property
mediaUriProp.desc: The URI to use for displaying media

thClass.label: Table Head Class Name
thClass.desc: The CSS class to apply to <th> elements

tdClass.label: Table Data Class Name
tdClass.desc: The CSS class to apply to <td> elements

getAll.label: Get All
getAll.desc: Whether to get all resources matching the query, or force pagination of the queries for rolling loads

responseFormat.label: Response Format
responseFormat.desc: The data format the API should return

perPage.label: Per Page
perPage.desc: The number of results for each page returned by the API

startPage.label: Start Page
startPage.desc: The start page of results from the API

query.label: Query
query.desc: The full query to send to the API

searchType.label: Search Type
searchType.desc: The type of search to use for the specific API, e.g. search vs item in DRS

thumbnailSize.label: Thumbnail Size
thumbnailSize.desc: The size of the thumbnail to use
thumbnailSize.notes: This will vary based on API result structure

separator.label: Separator
separator.desc: The separator character to use for key/value pairs

keyClass.label: Key Class
keyClass.desc: A CSS class to apply to keys in rendering arrays

valueClass.label: Value Class
valueClass.desc: A CSS class to apply to values in rendering arrays

leafletNative.notes: need to break this out? probably not if access remains limited to coders
